text: yep, I finally got it working. Just removed the POST EXECUTION function from workflow action. I thought it was needed to parse webhook response into OutputFields.

Hi <@U02EFVAAGCR>, I second this need from Maxime.
We build custom integrations for clients and for clients who do have an Operations Hub Pro and above, it's a shame that HubSpot can handle most of the HubSpot >> Other systems work but can't handle it the other way around (Other Systems >> HubSpot).

Given that HubSpot has a quite robust and flexible workflow system AND the ability to use custom code, I am convinced you could sell way more Operations Hub subscriptions if it came with the ability to manage 100% of the scope for a custom integration.
Ah yeah that can definitely mess it up

Hey <@U02E85T3S0K> and <@U02JH23B6T1>  I work on the workflows team at HubSpot as well. We are currently working on building a solution for webhook triggers. If you send me your email, I can reach out to you for feedback as we build it out and/or add you to the private beta once we have it ready. Thank you!
